Thanks to a partnership with EcoAct, the 9th edition of Convergences will be carbon neutral.
As a global actor in climate mitigation, EcoAct will measure and offset the CO2 emissions of the Forum by supporting a low carbon and certified project, to be voted on by the attendees.
